mapper.select: SELECT cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_user_seq, up_date, up_user_seq, ord, chk_use, level FROM board_category ORDER BY reg_date DESC
SELECT cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_user_seq, up_date, up_user_seq, ord, chk_use, level FROM board_category WHERE cate_code = #{cate_code}
SELECT cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_user_seq, up_date, up_user_seq, ord, chk_use, level FROM board_category WHERE top_cate = #{top_cate} ORDER BY ord
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_category ( cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_user_seq, up_date, up_user_seq, ord, chk_use, level ) VALUES ( #{cate_code}, #{top_cate}, #{name}, #{comt}, #{reg_date}, #{reg_user_seq}, #{up_date}, #{up_user_seq}, #{ord}, #{chk_use}, #{level} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_category SET top_cate = #{top_cate}, name = #{name}, comt = #{comt}, up_date = #{up_date}, up_user_seq = #{up_user_seq}, ord = #{ord}, chk_use = #{chk_use}, level = #{level} WHERE cate_code = #{cate_code}
